_description: Engelbergerstrasse 53 acquired at CHF 850,000 with 1.4% fixed interest (10-year term note), and strong operating assumptions: 70% occupancy, CHF 240 ADR, CHF 120 cleaning, 2.3 nights average stay.

_case_metadata.description: 850k purchase, 1.4% fixed 10yr, 70% occupancy, CHF 240 ADR, CHF 120 cleaning, 2.3-night avg stay

financing._explanation: Financing terms for this scenario. Interest is modeled as 1.4% annually; fixed-for-10-years is a scenario note for interpretation.

seasonal._explanation: Set all seasons to the same strong operating assumptions so annual occupancy and ADR reflect the requested values.
